DataElement.preferredName: Lymphadenopathy Pathological Lymph Node Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response to indicate the presence of an enlarged lymph node which has been pathologically confirmed as diseased.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An enlarged lymph node. Causes include viral and bacterial infections and cancers that affect the lymph nodes._Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology._A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical finding indicating that a lymph node is enlarged. Causes include viral and bacterial infections and cancers that affect the lymph nodes.

Concepts.definition: An enlarged lymph node. Causes include viral and bacterial infections and cancers that affect the lymph nodes.

Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.:A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.

A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/20/18 ls Released per CIP PI review (Justin, Brenda).6/12/18 jk created for CIP TCIA/TCGA OV features project.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

DataElement.changeDescription: 11/20/18 ls Released per CIP PI review (Justin, Brenda).6/15/18 jk created for CIP TCIA/TCGA OV features.
